properties.entry: Phase Detection
Step 1: Select A Substation
Step 2: Select Broadcast Routes
Instructions:

Select the routes to broadcast the clear and phase detect commands on. Some knowledge of your system's route layout maybe needed to understand which routes to unselect to avoid redundant or unnecessary broadcasting commands.
Step 3: Clear Phase Data
Step 4 Test Parameters
Step 5: Phase Detection Test
Instructions:
Reading
Read Progress

Lock out substation voltage regulators on the other two phases as well as all downline voltage regulators. For best results, step down one step on regulator right now and then up three steps after the timer expires that appears after 'Send' button is pressed. After voltage regulators are locked out press 'Send' when ready.
until you should tell the lineman to adjust the voltage regulators.
until you can tell the lineman to return the voltage regulators to normal.
Step 6: Phase Detection Results
Perform A Collection Action On Phase A Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase B Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase C Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase AB Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase AC Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase BC Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Phase ABC Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Undefined Meters
Perform A Collection Action On Failure Meters
